free_text.Content: 1. From Maxwell's equation to beam propagation methods (BPM)[br/]2. Relationship to classical diffraction integrals (Fresnel, Fraunhofer, Sommerfeld (paraxial / non paraxial BPM)).[br/]3. Lenses, grating, imaging[br/]4. Scattering particle, Mie Theory, BPM approximation[br/]5. Waveguides[br/]6. Phase conjugation, holography[br/]7. Volume holograms / grating[br/]8. Birefringent materials[br/]9. Coherence[br/]10. Nonlinear propagation equation and nonlinear BPM for chi(3), solitons[br/]11. Nonlinear propagation in chi(2), cascaded chi(2)[br/]12. Nonlinear imaging (chi(2) and chi(3))[br/]13. Second harmonic generation[br/]14. SHRIMPs (second harmonic radiating imaging microprobes)
